componentDescription: A visual indicator displaying the progress of an operation, customizable in appearance.

value.description: Represents the current progress value of the bar.

max.description: Specifies the maximum possible value for the progress bar.

color.description: Sets the color of the progress bar's filled portion.

backgroundColor.description: Sets the background color of the progress bar's track.

height.description: Defines the height of the progress bar.

radius.description: Sets the border-radius for the progress bar.

views.description: Provides an object to customize the styles of internal components (container and bar).
